<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Sturovenen (The Dragoneagle)](/Deities.aspx?ID=173)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Sarkorian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=15)

**Edicts** Act with conviction and confidence, be a passionate and responsible leader to your people or companions

**Anathema** Command a subordinate to perform a task you’re not willing to perform yourself

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, NG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

**Favored Weapon** [Main-gauche](/Weapons.aspx?ID=32)

**Domains** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=2), [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=4), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

- **5th**
[Cloak of Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=41)

- **6th**
[Dragon Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=88)

</column>
name: Sturovenen (The Dragoneagle)
